A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was terrible.  Please get JJ Abrams back fast.  On top of the plot holes people have brought up it was just cheesy.  Sorry but Mark is not a good actor.  Really bad.  I understand why they didnt have him talk in the last one. That bad guy snoke looked like a cartoon character.
